function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased park use during COVID-19","Impact":"Potential spread of contagious diseases due to increased gatherings in parks","Mitigation":"Enforce social distancing and mask-wearing in parks, promote outdoor activities while adhering to safety guidelines","Technologies":"Geotracking, mobile app notifications for guidelines, public health campaigns","People":"General public, frequent park users","Owner":"Public health agencies, park authorities"},{"Description":"Use of cell phone location data for research purposes","Impact":"Privacy concerns related to the use of personal data for research","Mitigation":"Anonymization of location data, obtaining informed consent from users, compliance with data privacy regulations","Technologies":"Anonymization algorithms, data protection measures, consent management platforms","People":"Individuals whose data is being used, researchers","Owner":"Research institutions, data privacy regulators"}]}
